title: France panorama. [No. 71/52]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The nativity of the master of Moulins - the Nativity painting of the Rolin museum in autumn. 2. Public works: The Marseille-Fox thruway link. An industrial Aesthetics Prize for the EDF. 3. Ophthalmology - the “retino-focometer”. 4. Hit parade - Esther Galil sings “Dawn in breaking”. 5. Audio-guided tourism - tape-recorded visits of Paris. 6. Picasso - Picasso retrospective.
